title.value: Инновационное развитие сельского хозяйства и перерабатывающей промышленности Волковысского района [Беларусь]
Innovative development of agriculture and processing industry in Volkovyssky district [Belarus]
Innovative development of agriculture and processing industry in Volkovyssky district [Belarus]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Churejno, O.I., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Innovation is one of the factors of increasing the efficiency and increasing the volume of agricultural production-governmental at improving its competitiveness in the domestic and foreign markets. The paper assesses the state of the modern with the innovative development of agriculture and processing industry Volkovysk district of the Republic of Belarus. Researches were spent at use of materials of the Belarus press, reports on results of the enterprises activity. There were considered core indicators and prospects for development of innovative processes in the agricultural industry of the Volkovysk district. The analysis of research results has shown, that process of innovative development in an agriculture and process industries of Volkovyssky district proceeds successfully enough.
